original_text: For twelve years they had been subject to Kedorlaomer, but in the thirteenth year they rebelled.
korean_text: 이들이 십이 년 동안 그돌라오멜을 섬기다가 제십삼년에 배반한지라

sentences.original_text: For twelve years they had been subject to Kedorlaomer
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 십이 년 동안 그돌라오멀에게 복종하였으나

sentences.original_text: but in the thirteenth year they rebelled
